name: FREE SHIPPING: Marimo Moss Ball Jar Aquarium / Terrarium
description:
TO VIEW MY ENTIRE COLLECTION PLEASE VISIT:  www.tinyterrains.com

This sweet little moss ball is ready for adoption! He makes the perfect little pet... super quiet and easy to care for and you don't even have to feed him! Legend has it, he will bring you love, happiness and good luck. He's happy floating around in his little glass jar and loves to be petted. When he is in a super good mood he will produce little bubbles of oxygen. He would love to keep you company at work.

Japanese marimo moss balls are actually fresh water algae (Cladophora aegagropila). They are soft, fuzzy and super easy to care for. Size will vary, but will average around 1/2" in diameter. Only needs artificial or indirect light and a water change every 1-2 weeks. No direct sun or fertilizer.

*Includes one small Marimo ball, about 1/2" in diameter (the glass may magnify the size of the ball in the photos), one glass jar with ceramic lid (3.5" tall x 2" wide), sea fan, a small shell and glass pebbles.


*Comes as a easy kit. Just place the pebbles inside the vase, fill with water, and let the little guy go swimming:)

*Includes detailed assembly and care instructions.

*Purchasing a gift? I am happy to include a card, just leave me a note with your message when ordering.

*FREE SHIPPING WITH USPS FIRST CLASS MAIL.

***SHIPPING***
I personally handmake and ship each order, so please allow up to 7 business days before shipping. During the busy holidays it may take longer. Orders are processed in the order they are received. Please contact me if you need a rush order or a certain delivery date. You will receive a tracking email once your order ships. I package terrariums very carefully to prevent breakage and things being tossed around. I guarantee the safe arrival of your order.

***INTERNATIONAL*** Unfortunately, I do not ship live plants outside the United States due to customs laws.

TO VISIT MY MAIN STORE PLEASE VISIT:  www.tinyterrains.com

name: Pretty Modern Vessel Lichen Terrarium
description:
TO VIEW MY ENTIRE COLLECTION PLEASE VISIT:  www.tinyterrains.com

This pretty little modern terrarium is planted in a sleek glass vessel. Laying on a bed of colorful blue, green and white glass pebbles are bright green lichens. Decorated with teeny pinecones and dried flowers. 

*Completely carefree! No water or light needed.

*Comes as an easy and fun to assemble kit. Measures 8.5" x 2" tall.
(I personally build each terrarium before disassembling it to package as a kit for shipping. That way, I can make sure that yours will look perfect!)

*Includes detailed assembly instructions along with a color photo of it assembled.

*Ships with USPS 2-3 day Priority Mail, tracking and delivery confirmation included.

*Purchasing a gift? I am happy to include a card, just leave me a note with your message when ordering.

***SHIPPING***
I personally handmake and ship each order, so please allow up to 7 business days before shipping. During the busy holidays it may take longer. Orders are processed in the order they are received. Please contact me if you need a rush order or a certain delivery date. You will receive a tracking email once your order ships. I package terrariums very carefully to prevent breakage and things being tossed around. I guarantee the safe arrival of your order.

***INTERNATIONAL***I can ship this terrarium international if I replace the lichens with preserved moss. It is just as pretty that way. Contact me if you are interested in a shipping quote.

name: Teardrop Lichen Terrarium
description:
TO VIEW MY ENTIRE COLLECTION PLEASE VISIT:  www.tinyterrains.com

Your very own miniature woodland landscape tucked into a perfect little teardrop terrarium! Love the shape of this vase! Nested inside are a variety of sweet little lichens. There are cute little Cladonia Cup lichens, bright green Wolf lichens and the fun Brown-Eyed Wolf lichen. They are all landscaped on a bed of polished pebbles.

*Super carefree and easy to grow!! Will not die if not watered. No direct sun or fertilizer.

*Comes as an easy and fun to assemble kit. Measures 4.5" x 4".
(I personally build each terrarium before disassembling it to package as a kit for shipping. That way, I can make sure that yours will look perfect!)

*Includes detailed assembly and care instructions along with a color photo of it assembled.

*Ships with USPS 2-3 day Priority Mail, tracking and delivery confirmation included.

*Purchasing a gift? I am happy to include a card, just leave me a note with your message when ordering.

No need to worry about watering this terrarium, lichens are very hardy and do not die when they dry out. Lichens become brittle and stiff when not watered, but look pretty much the same. Spritz lightly with a little water and they become soft, pliable and spongy. Lichens need to dry out between waterings so you can water when it is convenient for you. 

Lichens are unusual creatures and are not a single organism the way most other living things are, but rather a combination of two organisms living together intimately. They are a combination of fungi and algae working together. 

***SHIPPING***
I personally handmake and ship each order, so please allow up to 7 business days before shipping. During the busy holidays it may take longer. Orders are processed in the order they are received. Please contact me if you need a rush order or a certain delivery date. You will receive a tracking email once your order ships. I package terrariums very carefully to prevent breakage and things being tossed around. I guarantee the safe arrival of your order.

***INTERNATIONAL*** Unfortunately, I do not ship live plants outside the United States due to customs laws.
